long_description: The party doesn't start until you show up with the 70 qt. Coleman Xtreme(R) 5 cooler. It provides ample space for all your food and drinks, fitting 100 cans, plus ice. ThermOZONE(TM) insulation retains ice for 5 days in temperatures up to 90degF. Hinged lid closes securely and features 4 cup holders on top. Rustproof, leak-resistant channel drains water without requiring that you tip the cooler. Carry the Coleman Xtreme 5 cooler to and from the campsite with the handles on the ends.
short_description: The party doesn't start until you show up with the 70 qt. Coleman Xtreme(R) 5 cooler. It provides ample space for all your food and drinks, fitting 100 cans, plus ice.
